title: Toad-in-the-hole using homemade sausages
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) lean minced pork', '100 g (3½ oz) fresh breadcrumbs', '1 medium-sized leek, finely chopped', '55 g (2 oz) soft sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', 'salt and pepper', 'Batter', '125 g (4½ oz) plain flour', '2 eggs', '300 ml (10 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '2 tbsp chopped parsley', 'Root vegetable mash', '2 medium-sized carrots, cut into chunks', '2 medium-sized parsnips, cut into chunks', '1 medium-sized swede, cut into chunks', '200 g (7 oz) French beans, trimmed and sliced diagonally', 'Baked beans', '1 small red onion, finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '3 tbsp tomato purée', '200 ml (7 fl oz) vegetable stock', '2 cans cannellini beans, about 400 g each, drained and rinsed']
